title: AAA Mega Championship
summary: The AAA Mega Championship is a professional wrestling world heavyweight championship in the Mexican Lucha Libre AAA Worldwide (AAA) promotion. Known officially in Spanish as the Mega Campeonato AAA, it is sometimes referred to in the English-language press as the "AAA World Heavyweight Championship".[7] The title is the top championship of the AAA promotion. The current champion is El Hijo del Vikingo.
